bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization")).length !== 0 && ImageLimit() !== 'undefined') {
        let L = Login_1();
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n圖片讀取/上限：' + L[1] + '/' + L[0] + '\n┋┋' + '\n重置时间：' + secondsToHours(L[2]) + '後重置' + '\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('推荐漫画', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@a{{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最近阅读', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@b{{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣  收　　藏  ✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最新加入', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@c{{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最近更新', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@d{{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('未看完', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@e{{page}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('未看', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@f{{page}}`, 1, 0.2, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('已看完', `{{Get('url')}}/api/query@g{{page}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}

title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option = `{{get('option','0')}}`;
Option1 = `{{get('option1','0')}}`;
Option2 = `{{get('option2','0')}}`;
Option3 = `{{get('option3','0')}}`;
Option4 = `{{get('option4','0')}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',${i})}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/query,${Option}0${Option1}{{30*(page-1)}}${Option2}${OrderBy}${Option3}${Status}${Option4}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
for (j in allCategory) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('p'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/query,${Option}${allCategory[j].id}${Option1}{{30*(page-1)}}${Option2}${OrderBy}${Option3}${Status}${Option4}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(allCategory[j].name, url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (allCategory.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (allCategory.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(60, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "账号：", type: "text" },
  { name: "密码：", type: "password" },
  {
    name: "      💡登录账号💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "Login()"
  },
  {
    name: "      💡源站测试💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test(1)"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(-1)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换进度  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "q(0)" },
  { name: "      连 载      ", type: "button", action: "q(1)" },
  { name: "      完 结      ", type: "button", action: "q(2)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击收藏排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "            最新加入            ", type: "button", action: "o(0)" },
  { name: "            最近更新            ", type: "button", action: "o(1)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击标签排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      更 新      ", type: "button", action: "p(0)" },
  { name: "      爱 心      ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },
  { name: "      热 门      ", type: "button", action: "p(2)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

        option = '{"body":{"operationName":"recommendComicIds","variables":{"pagination":{"limit":30,"offset":' + 30*(page-1) + ',"orderBy":"DATE_UPDATED","asc":true},"category":""},"query":"query recommendComicIds($category: String, $pagination: Pagination!) {\n  recommendComicIds(category: $category, pagination: $pagination)\n}"},"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + '","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}';
        url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option;
        result = java.ajax(url);
        json = JSON.parse(result).data.recommendComicIds;
        if (json.length > 0) {
            for (var i in json) {
                comicIds.push(String(json[i]));
            }
            var strcomicIds = '["' + comicIds.join('","') + '"]';
            let url1 = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + get('hoption1','0') + strcomicIds + get('hoption2','0') + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + get('hoption3','0');
            result = java.ajax(url1);

            json = [];
        } else {
            var list = [];
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('@b')) {
        var page = baseUrl.replace(/.*@b/, '')
        option = '{"body":{"operationName":"readComicHistory","variables":{"pagination":{"limit":30,"offset":' + 30*(page-1) + ',"orderBy":"DATE_UPDATED","asc":true}},"query":"query readComicHistory($pagination: Pagination!) {\n  readComicHistory(pagination: $pagination) {\n    id\n    comicId\n    chapters {\n      id\n      chapterId\n      page\n      __typename\n    }\n    startDate\n    lastDate\n    chapterType\n    __typename\n  }\n}"},"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + '","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}';
        url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option;
        result = java.ajax(url);

        if (json.length > 0) {
            for (var i in json) {

            result = java.ajax(url1);

    }
    option1 = '{"body":{"operationName":"favoritesQuery","variables":{"pagination":{"limit":30,"offset":';
    option2 = ',"orderBy":"';
    option3 = '","status":"';
    option4 = '","asc":true,"readProgress":"';
    option5 = '"}},"query":"query favoritesQuery($pagination: Pagination!) {\n  getLatestUpdatedDateInFavorite\n  favoritesV2(pagination: $pagination) {\n    id\n    comicId\n    dateAdded\n    lastAccess\n    bookReadProgress\n    chapterReadProgress\n    __typename\n  }\n}"},"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + '","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}';
    if (baseUrl.includes('@c')) {

        url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option;

        url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option;

        json = JSON.parse(result).data.favoritesV2;
        if (json.length > 0) {

                comicIds.push(String(json[i].comicId));
            }

            result = java.ajax(url1);
            var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comicByIds;
        } else {
            var list = [];
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('@g')) {
        var page = baseUrl.replace(/.*@g/, '')
        option = option1 + 30*(page-1) + option2 + get('orderBy1',Get('o')) + option3 +  get('status',Get('q')) + option4 + 'COMPLETED' + option5;
        url = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + option;
        result = java.ajax(url);
        json = JSON.parse(result).data.favoritesV2;
        if (json.length > 0) {
            for (var i in json) {
                comicIds.push(String(json[i].comicId));
            }
            var strcomicIds = '["' + comicIds.join('","') + '"]';
            let url1 = Get('url') + '/api/query,' + get('hoption1','0') + strcomicIds + get('hoption2','0') + cache.get(Get('url') + 'authorization') + get('hoption3','0');
            result = java.ajax(url1);
            var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comicByIds;
        } else {
            var list = [];
        }
    }
    if (!baseUrl.includes('@')) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comicByCategory;
    }
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = list[i].title;
        var authors = [];
        var authorElements = list[i].authors;
        for (var j in authorElements) {
            authors.push(String(authorElements[j].name));
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/\s/g, '');
        var read = json.length == 0 ? '' : json[i].chapterReadProgress.replace(/UNREAD/, '未看').replace(/STARTED/, '未看完').replace(/COMPLETED/, '已看完');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].categories;
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].name));
        }
        kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].views) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].favoriteCount) + ',' + list[i].status.replace(/END/g, '完结').replace(/ONGOING/g, '连载') + ',' + list[i].year + ',' + kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        latest = '第' + ((list[i].lastBookUpdate ? list[i].lastBookUpdate + '卷' : '') || (list[i].lastChapterUpdate ? list[i].lastChapterUpdate + '话' : '')) +  '〔' + list[i].dateUpdated.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/Z/g, '') + '〕';
        var body = '{"operationName":"comicById","variables":{"comicId":"' + list[i].id + '"},"query":"query comicById($comicId: ID!) {\n  comicById(comicId: $comicId) {\n    id\n    title\n    status\n    year\n    imageUrl\n    authors {\n      id\n      name\n      __typename\n    }\n    categories {\n      id\n      name\n      __typename\n    }\n    dateCreated\n    dateUpdated\n    views\n    favoriteCount\n    lastBookUpdate\n    lastChapterUpdate\n    __typename\n  }\n}"}';
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': read + ',' + kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].imageUrl,
            'url': Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}'
        });
    }
    var next = '';
    if (!list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';

var data = [];
var data1 = [];
var J = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.chaptersByComicId;
    comicId = baseUrl.substring(baseUrl.indexOf('comicId":') + 10, baseUrl.lastIndexOf('"query"') - 3);
    date = java.get("date");
    date1 = list[list.length - 1].dateUpdated.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/Z/g, '');
    date2 = '';
    for (i in list) {
        date3 = list[i].dateUpdated.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/Z/g, '');
        title = String('第' + list[i].serial + (list[i].type == "book" ? '卷 (' : '話 (') + list[i].size + 'p)');
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[章回期](|\s)第.*?[章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        var body = '{"operationName":"imagesByChapterId","variables":{"chapterId":"' + list[i].id + '"},"query":"query imagesByChapterId($chapterId: ID!) {\n  imagesByChapterId(chapterId: $chapterId) {\n    id\n    kid\n    height\n    width\n    __typename\n  }\n}"}';
        if (list[i].type == "book") {
            if (data1.length >= 1) {
                data1[data1.length - 1].title = data1[data1.length - 1].title.replace(/〔.*/g, '');
            }
            data1.push({
                'title': title + '〔' + date3 + '〕',
                'link': Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization") + '","Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/comic/' + comicId + '/chapter/' + list[i].id + '/images/all?page=1","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}',
                'time': list[i].dateUpdated.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/Z/g, '')
            });
        } else {
            data.push({
                'title': (i == list.length - 1 || date.includes(date3) || date1.includes(date3) || date2.includes(date3)) ? title + '〔' + date3 + '〕' : title,
                'link': Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"authorization":"' + cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization") + '","Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/comic/' + comicId + '/chapter/' + list[i].id + '/images/all?page=1","Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}',
                'time': list[i].dateUpdated.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/Z/g, '')
            });
        }
    }
    J.push({'title': '分卷阅读', 'vol': 'true'});
    data1 = (data.length >= 1 && data1.length >= 1) ? J.concat(data1) : data1;
    data = data.concat(data1);
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = '{"operationName":"searchComicAndAuthorQuery","variables":{"keyword":"' + e + '"},"query":"query searchComicAndAuthorQuery($keyword: String!) {
  searchComicsAndAuthors(keyword: $keyword) {
    comics {
      id
      title
      status
      year
      imageUrl
      authors {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      categories {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      dateUpdated
      monthViews
      views
      favoriteCount
      lastBookUpdate
      lastChapterUpdate
      __typename
    }
    authors {
      id
      name
      chName
      enName
      wikiLink
      comicCount
      views
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}';
    return Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>
